parameters.name: Arp
parameters.description: Specifies whether address resolution protocol (ARP) is enabled for the check type.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: Ping
parameters.description: Specifies whether ping is enabled for the check type.

parameters.name: ProbeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the probe.

> You can call the [ListHoneypotProbe](~~ListHoneypotProbe~~) operation to query the IDs of probes.

parameters.name: ServiceIpList
parameters.description: The IP addresses that are monitored.
